synopsis.text:
Milin, the fourth generation of Kuiba, is born in Lingshan, a desolate land inhabited by society's outcasts - the poor, the vicious, and the extremely wicked. As Milin's extraordinary powers begin to manifest, the Heavenly Realm becomes determined to eliminate him, even if it means obliterating Lingshan in the process.

In the face of imminent destruction, Milin rises to the challenge and awakens the spirits of his fellow Lingshan inhabitants. Together, they form a formidable army, ready to defend their homeland against the seemingly invincible celestial forces. As Milin leads the charge against the Heavenly Realm, he becomes an unstoppable force, sweeping across the world and ultimately becoming its overlord. With the fate of Lingshan in his hands, Milin's epic journey unfolds in this thrilling anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
